Articles.Content: Has anyone seen this? I've found it kinda funny...

Yeah it is a known easter egg but I find it kind of funny too everytime I see it

There are a lot of hints on several Parts. There is a smiley in one of the holes of the open goo container and one of the ascii-codes on the big antenna dish says "beep" if you decode it

Also there are the launch-dates of MIR and ISS on the Spacelab.
On one of the rover wheels there's a warning label stating: "Not certified for really cool jumps". I couldn't stop laughing after I read that. I LOVE this game.
Nana-Nana Nana-Nana Nana-Nana Nana-Nana DURACELL! just didn't have the same ring to it.
I smiled when I spotted it, yeah. Not sure it really qualifies as an "easter egg" though, it's not hard to find like the anomalies say.
And doesn't one part have ISS and MIR written on the bottom?

I smiled when I spotted it, yeah. Not sure it really qualifies as an "easter egg" though, it's not hard to find like the anomalies say.

I still would classify it as an Easter Egg. Check out the wiki definition:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Easter_egg_(media)

And doesn't one part have ISS and MIR written on the bottom?

I believe the science lab also displays the date each of those stations were launched.
